TopicTitle: Can we creat wings like airtream shell?

Articles.Content: Pick small wing plate one by one and connenct them with connector is too frustrating, and big wings made from them is ugly and fragile. The method you provide to create airstream protective shell inspired me. Why not provide us with different size wing root, and then shape the wing like shell, calculate the draw and lift by its square.![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
